title: Urschel and Thomas 2019 Preface to Mind and Matter

content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Urschel and Thomas make to achieve their purpose of introducing the reader to the book.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Urschel and Thomas make to achieve their purpose of introducing the reader to the book.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
